SEARCH
Package ca.mcgill.ecse321.gameorganizer.repositories

Interface GameRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Game,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Game,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Game,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Game,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Game,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Game>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Game,Integer>
@Repository public interface GameRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Game,Integer>
Repository interface for managing Game entities. Provides CRUD operations and custom queries for games.

    • findAvailableGames

      @Query("SELECT g FROM Game g WHERE g.id NOT IN (SELECT br.requestedGame.id FROM BorrowRequest br WHERE br.status = \'APPROVED\' AND br.startDate <= ?1 AND br.endDate >= ?1)") List<Game> findAvailableGames(Date currentDate)
      Finds all games that are available for borrowing on a given date.
      Parameters:
      currentDate - the date to check availability
      Returns:
      list of available games

    • findUnavailableGames

      @Query("SELECT g FROM Game g WHERE g.id IN (SELECT br.requestedGame.id FROM BorrowRequest br WHERE br.status = \'APPROVED\' AND br.startDate <= ?1 AND br.endDate >= ?1)") List<Game> findUnavailableGames(Date currentDate)
      Finds all games that are unavailable (borrowed) on a given date.
      Parameters:
      currentDate - the date to check availability
      Returns:
      list of unavailable games

    • findByAverageRatingGreaterThanEqual

      @Query("SELECT g FROM Game g WHERE (SELECT COALESCE(AVG(r.rating), 0) FROM Review r WHERE r.gameReviewed = g) >= ?1") List<Game> findByAverageRatingGreaterThanEqual(double minRating)
